description: Philips DVD player, 1080p Upscaling, DivX Ultra certified, Plays CD, CD-R-RW,MP3/WMA, DVD, DVD-R/+R, DivX to support video downloads from your PC in Mpeg4 format, 1080P upscaling will increase the picture resolution performance from your movie CD's to 1080P resolution similation, plays Jpeg picture CD's, Progressive Scan. Full size 420 mm width
title: Philips DVP5982 1080p Upscaling DVD Player
